Comments: We are displaying the user's psychological profile if he/she is ISTP. We then ask for feeback

OptionalPrompt.Path: Here is your psychological profile. Does that sound like you?

Label.en: Fascinated by tools and techniques from a very young age, you crave excitement and are often found in extreme sports, far-off travels and adventures. You express yourself through action rather than language and may therefore look shy or difficult to tame. While you enjoy your freedom and dislike authority, you also make a loyal friend who will always willing to give a hand for any mechanical work or repairs that could be needed by those around you.
Label.fr: Fasciné par les outils et les techniques depuis ton plus jeune âge, tu aimes les sensations fortes, les sports extrêmes et les aventures hors des sentiers battus. Tu t'exprimes dans l'action plutôt que par la parole et peut en conséquence sembler timide ou difficile à dompter. Même si tu aimes ton indépendance et n'apprécies pas l'autorité, tu es aussi un ami loyal qui sera toujours prêt à donner un coup de main à ton entourage.

Label.en: No, that doesn't sound like me
Label.fr: Non, je ne me reconnais pas
